game.name: Bunker KYS
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Survive in a bunker in this intense social game for 4-10 players. Form alliances, manipulate opponents, and vote on who to condemn to certain death. In a stylish low-poly atmosphere, your main weapon will be not strength, but your ability to negotiate.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Survive in a bunker in this intense social game for 4-10 players. Form alliances, manipulate opponents, and vote on who to condemn to certain death. In a stylish low-poly atmosphere, your main weapon will be not strength, but your ability to negotiate.
